summary: Healthcare website with admin panel for footer customization
architectural_notes: Healthcare/medical website with patient reviews functionality
Admin panel system for content management
Footer section requires dynamic content management

existing_features.title: Create a new FooterManager admin component that allows editing of all footer sections (Contact Information, Quick Links, Social Media) and their headings
Implement drag-and-drop or up/down controls in FooterManager to allow reordering of footer sections
Add FooterManager tab to the AdminPanel component alongside existing Content, Hero Theme, Clinics, Services, Reviews, and Social Media tabs
Update Footer component to render sections dynamically based on admin-configured order and headings from backend

new_feature_requests.summary: Admin panel for footer with ability to modify sections/headings and rearrange section order
Extend backend data model to support footer section configuration including section titles, content, and display order

projectName: Add comprehensive admin panel for footer section management
